title: Instant Pot Vegan Cabbage Detox Soup Recipe
description: This simple vegan detox cabbage soup is so easy to cook in your Instant Pot with carrots, celery, onion, canned tomatoes, and vegetable broth.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Vegetable Soup Recipes Cabbage Soup Recipes Instant Pot Vegan Cabbage Detox Soup 4.5 (248) 196 Reviews 39 Photos This simple vegan cabbage soup is perfect for a detox diet. It's a tasty recipe that's easy to make in your Instant Pot. Submitted by Fioa Updated on April 4, 2023 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 39 39 39 39 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 25 mins Additional Time: 10 mins Total Time: 50 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 3 cups coarsely chopped green cabbage 2 ½ cups vegetable broth 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes 3 medium carrots, chopped 3 stalks celery, chopped 1 medium onion, chopped 2 cloves garlic 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar 1 tablespoon lemon juice 2 teaspoons dried sage Directions Combine cabbage, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, vinegar, lemon juice, and sage in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Close and lock the lid. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set the timer for 15 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 1,400 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 67 Calories 0g Fat 13g Carbs 2g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 67 % Daily Value * Total Fat 0g 1% Saturated Fat 0g 1% Sodium 348mg 15% Total Carbohydrate 13g 5% Dietary Fiber 4g 14% Total Sugars 7g Protein 2g 5% Vitamin C 27mg 30% Calcium 79mg 6% Iron 2mg 12% Potassium 367mg 8% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Instant Pot Vegan Cabbage Detox Soup 01 of 39 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 39 Photo by  ICantCook 01/11/2021 03 of 39 Photo by  OldBran5308 01/09/2021 04 of 39 Photo by  Jennifer 01/05/2021 05 of 39 Photo by  RayandLarissa Lemp 01/03/2021 06 of 39 Photo by  Darien DeMartini 01/02/2021 07 of 39 Photo by  dslaughter97 10/10/2020 08 of 39 Photo by  Çostèllô JÈb 10/07/2020 09 of 39 Photo by  Diane Vitoria 05/03/2020 I followed this recipe exactly and did not care for it. It had way too much sage... it probably would be better if there were some more different spices, but all I could taste was the sage with every bite. 10 of 39 Photo by  Jenn 01/09/2020 Made this a few times now and here are my adjustments: I add a bay leaf, 3 additional cloves of garlic, 1.5 cups of veggie broth (totaling the entire carton), and 1 tsp of paprika to the ingredients. Copying other IP recipes, I sauté a little vegetable oil with the garlic, onions, sage, and paprika to bring out the flavors. Afterwards, I add the other ingredients, cook for 15 min, and NPR in 10 minutes. Great recipe, my boyfriend asks for this one! 1 2 3 4 Next You’ll Also Love Skinny Cabbage Soup 10 Ratings Instant Pot Vegetarian Cabbage Soup 1 Rating Meatless Cajun Cabbage Soup 3 Ratings Pressure Cooker Soup: From Moscow with Cabbage Cabbage Fat-Burning Soup 2,255 Ratings Cabbage, Leek, and Broccoli Soup 3 Ratings Instant Pot Vegan Vegetable and Barley Soup 28 Ratings Instant Pot Vegan 15-Bean Soup 18 Ratings Sweet and Tangy Cabbage Soup 1 Rating Hearty Cabbage-Rutabaga Slow Cooker Soup 4 Ratings Instant Pot Cabbage Roll Soup 35 Ratings Instant Pot Vegan Quinoa and Kale Minestrone Soup 2 Ratings Instant Pot Vegetable Soup 4 Ratings Instant Pot Vegan Lentil Soup 16 Ratings Sasha's Vegan Borscht Passover Unstuffed Cabbage Soup 33 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
